tpk::deltav

tpk::deltav Struct Reference

#include <Coordinates.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Vector displacement.

A deltav structure represents the displacement beween two vector directions. it can be multiplied or divided by a double and a pair of deltav's can be added and subtracted.
